```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggvis)
```


```{r, linear model}
y = lm(wt ~ mpg, mtcars) # deriving a linear regression
summary(y)

# plot a linear regression using ggvis
mtcars %>%
  ggvis(~mpg, ~wt) %>%
  layer_points() %>%
  layer_model_predictions(model = "lm", se = TRUE)
  
# just line
mtcars %>%
  compute_model_prediction(wt~mpg, model = "lm") %>% 
  ggvis(~pred_, ~resp_) %>% 
  layer_lines()
```
